title: 【88金币】Minecraft崩溃了！
author: 吾是新手渣渣
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Oh - I know what I did wrong!

Time: 2014/5/3 下午 9:30
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

cpw.mods.fml.common.LoaderException: java.lang.NoSuchFieldError: iron

replies.author: Franz
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Franz 于 2014-5-4 12:52 编辑 

载入mod时发生了一个严重问题导致崩溃

好像和铁有关............

把Translocator去了试试

replies.author: 时光之流
replies.txt_content: 楼主这是装了MOD后的还是？

replies.author: 吾是新手渣渣
replies.txt_content:
时光之流 发表于 2014-5-3 22:15
楼主这是装了MOD后的还是？
装了MOD
